Posts.Content: Feb 1, 2012 05:31PM ann1234 wrote: Hi - all good information and I am glad you all take the time to respond.  I am a year out from radiation and was just diagnosed with radiation pleuritis.  I had pneumonia like symptoms not associated with cold for a month and got a CT scan to determine the cause.  Will be treated with steroids (prednazone) for 2 weeks.
Posts.Title: Radiation-Induced Pleurisy? annac sdianel
